title: SCRIPT_RACE_INIT
content:
0x0A60017F841A54F20x2D33F15A// ScriptRaceInit
void SCRIPT_RACE_INIT(int numCheckpoints, int numLaps, int numPlayers, Player localPlayer);Parameters:numCheckpoints: The total number of checkpoints in the racenumLaps: The total number of laps in the race.numPlayers: The total number of players participating in the race.localPlayer: Local player in the race.Initializes a script race in GTA:Online and sets up the helper split time system.NativeDB Introduced: v323
codeBlocks:
